title: Acerca de mi
introduction:
hola! As a proficient front-end developer, I take pride in crafting pixel-perfect UIs. With extensive knowledge in modern frameworks, I ensure responsiveness across all devices. My dedication is evident in every line of code, ensuring optimal performance and user experience.

Collaborating closely with design and backend teams, I bridge the gap to bring visions to life. Leveraging the latest web technologies, I'm always at the forefront of the digital landscape. My code is clean, maintainable, and in line with the best industry practices.
